entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains early this evening. Wind becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind light except east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the Richardson mountains in the morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
